Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to discuss the upcoming Australian Federal Budget expressing concerns and demands. Some have criticized the Labor party for announcing no JobSeeker raise while Homelessness Australia called for increased support for young people in the budget. Meanwhile the LNP demanded funding for the Ring Road project while GPs called for changes to make health cover more affordable for everyone. Amidst all these discussions a group of people strongly recommended that the JobSeeker rate be increased substantially and expressed their outrage towards acts of cruelty.
